components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Multiple Networks in Belarus

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in Belarus. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple networks in Belarus. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Movistar network in Peru is conducting an emergency maintenance from 19 February 2024 at 21:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Movistar Peru handsets.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 February 2024 21:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

incident_updates.body: The AT&T network in Mexico is conducting an emergency maintenance from 19 February 2024 at 22:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T Mexico handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Philippines is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 at 02:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 02:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to a subset of Philippines phone numbers.

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 19:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US, Canada and Puerto Rico Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US, Canada and Puerto Rico is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 22 February 2024 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US, Canada and Puerto Rico handsets via subset of Shortcodes and Longcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US, Canada and Puerto Rico SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in US, Canada and Puerto Rico is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 23 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US, Canada and Puerto Rico long codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

20 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
21 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 22 February 2024 at 04:00 PST
22 February 2024 at 20:00 PST until 23 February 2024 at 04:00 PST

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US are conducting an emergency maintenance from 20 February 2024 at 21:00 PST until 20 February 2024 at 01:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carriers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone UK

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Vodafone UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 February 2024 at 15:20 PST until 22 February 2024 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Vodafone UK customers.
Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

The AT&T network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 February 2024 19:00 PST until 23 February 2024 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from AT&T US handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: New Zealand SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in New Zealand is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 February 2024 at 13:00 PST until 24 February 2024 at 13:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of New Zealand handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Montenegro SMS Carrier Maintenance - T-Mobile (Crnogorski Telekom)

incident_updates.body: The T-Mobile (Crnogorski Telekom) network in Montenegro is conducting a planned maintenance from 26 February 2024 at 15:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to T-Mobile (Crnogorski Telekom) Montenegro handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 February 2024 at 13:00 PST until 27 February 2024 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call failures to and from a subset of Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Netherlands Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - KPN

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner KPN is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 March 2024 at 13:00 PST until 09 March 2024 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for KPN customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup Identity Match, Lookup SIM Swap, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The MegaFon/Yota network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 19 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MegaFon/Yota Russia handsets.
